# CSSRule Additions Reference

**API Collection**

These extensions to the `CSSRule` class are used to access animation keyframe and keyframes rules.

## Constants

- **WEBKIT_KEYFRAMES_RULE**: Keyframes rule type. Read [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/webkitcsskeyframesrule] for details.
- **WEBKIT_KEYFRAME_RULE**: Keyframe rule type. Read [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/webkitcsskeyframesrule] for details.
